Title: Supreme Court rules that companies can require workers to accept individual arbitration
Description: The decision confirms that certain contracts can keep workers from pursuing class-action lawsuits in federal court.

Title: Pompeo vows U.S., Mideast allies will ‘crush’ Iranian operatives around the world
Description: In a speech to the Heritage Foundation, the U.S. secretary of state laid out a list of demands Iran must agree to before sanctions are lifted.

Title: Trump Defends Administration’s Trade Strategy With China
Description: The president praised his approach, and criticized Democrats, in a series of tweets on Monday following a three-day negotiation session that ended with little clarity.

Title: Now Even Japan Is Pushing Back Against Trump’s Tariffs
Description: Japan is considering filing a complaint with the W.T.O. against the United States for tariffs on steel and aluminum imports, a sign it could be readying for a trade war.

Title: Harry and Meghan release wedding photos
Description: The royal newly-weds have released three official photographs from their wedding day at Windsor Castle on Saturday.

Title: Analysis | Is Rod Rosenstein indulging Trump’s conspiracy theories too much?
Description: Rosenstein may be playing the long game and trying to buy some time. But he also risks undermining the Mueller probe.

Title: Hillary Clinton trolls Trump with Russian hat - CNN Video
Description: While speaking during Yale University's 2018 class day, Hillary Clinton took a jab at her former 2016 campaign rival, now-President Donald Trump.

Title: In Texas, Changing Talk About Guns, but Will Change Follow?
Description: When Texas Gov. Greg Abbott this week convenes the first of his planned roundtable discussions to come up with laws to protect people from gun violence, it could mark a turning point for the state.

Title: Advanced Features Make Cars Safer, but They’re Slow to Catch On
Description: Most new cars nowadays can be outfitted with advanced safety gear, but salespeople often fail to pitch buyers on the benefits of these potentially lifesaving but costly features.

Title: Trump lambastes a former CIA director ahead of installation of a new one
Description: On Twitter, the president quoted a harsh critic of John Brennan, who led the agency under President Barack Obama.

Title: Advising Bolton is a ‘Shadow N.S.C.’
Description: The new national security adviser has been quietly taking advice from a few longtime associates. Some have business interests that overlap with the N.S.C.

Title: Pompeo threatens US will 'crush' Iran through sanctions and pressure campaign
Description: The US will aim to "crush" Iran with economic and military pressure unless it changes its behavior in the Middle East, Secretary of State Mike Pompeo said Monday.

Title: US vows strongest ever Iran sanctions
Description: The top US diplomat says Iran will be "battling to keep its economy alive" after sanctions take effect.

Title: U.S. Lays Out Demands for New Iran Nuclear Deal
Description: The Trump administration escalated its demands on Iran, putting Tehran on notice that any new nuclear deal would require it to stop enriching all uranium and halt its support for militant groups in the region.

Title: Trump warns China to stay ‘strong & tight’ on North Korea border
Description: The president’s tweet comes amid continuing uncertainty about whether his summit with Kim Jong Un will take place next month.

Title: China launch will prep for Moon landing
Description: China has launched a relay satellite to prepare for a Moon rover mission planned for later in the year.

Title: Treasury Secretary Says U.S., China Have Suspended Tariffs
Description: The U.S. suspended its threat to impose tariffs on $150 billion in Chinese imports to the U.S. while negotiations with China continue, but President Donald Trump could impose the tariffs if a deal between the two countries doesn’t progress, Treasury Secretary…

Title: An Immigration Debate Distinct From Economic Realities
Description: There is a good case that America’s economy has never needed immigrant labor more than it does now. The long-term demographic trends also suggest immigration can be more helpful than harmful. Yet the climate is more hostile toward immigrants and immigration t…

Title: Hawaiians warned of toxic fumes threat
Description: The hazardous plumes form as molten rock from the erupting Kilauea volcano hits the Pacific Ocean.

Title: Toxic mushrooms poison hundreds in Iran
Description: People in Iran are warned not to buy loose mushrooms after at least 800 people fall ill and 11 die.
